org.apache.http.client.methods

接口 HttpExecutionAware

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AbstractExecutionAwareRequest, HttpDelete, HttpEntityEnclosingRequestBase, HttpGet, HttpHead, HttpOptions, HttpPatch, HttpPost, HttpPut, HttpRequestBase, HttpTrace

    public interface HttpExecutionAware
    Interface to be implemented by any object that wishes to be notified of blocking I/O operations that could be cancelled.
    从以下版本开始:
    4.3

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean isAborted() 
      void setCancellable(Cancellable cancellable)
      Sets Cancellable for the ongoing operation.
